name: Bonsai by Numbers
description:
Paste numbers onto the number bonsai tree to create the fantasy number bonsai of your wildest dreams. You can only paste numbers onto the previous number (e.g. 2 can be pasted only onto 1). Note that 0 can only be pasted onto 9.

Left click to paste.  WASD/Arrows to move camera. Mouse wheel to zoom.

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #83. Theme: "Trees" Sorry the game is so ugly - didn't get a chance for an aesthetics pass - would have made some numbers into bark colors, and some into leaf colors.

Third Party Assets:

  • Music: A Very Brady Special by Kevin MacLeod (CC 4.0 )
  • Font: Super Mario 256 by fsuarez913
